00037 void sopt_meas_urandsamp(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00038     
00039     int i;
00040     complex double *yc;
00041     complex double *xc;
00042     double *yr;
00043     double *xr;
00044     sopt_meas_usparam *param;
00045 
00046     //Cast input pointers
00047     param = (sopt_meas_usparam*)data[0];
00048 
00049     if (param->real_flag == 1){
00050       yr = (double*)out;
00051       xr = (double*)in;
00052     }
00053     else {
00054       yc = (complex double*)out;
00055       xc = (complex double*)in;
00056     }
00057 
00058     if (param->real_flag == 1){
00059       for (i=0; i < param->nmeas; i++)
00060         yr[i] = xr[param->perm[i]];
00061     }
00062     else {
00063       for (i=0; i < param->nmeas; i++)
00064         yc[i] = xc[param->perm[i]];
00065     }
00066 }

00076 void sopt_meas_urandsampadj(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00077     
00078     int i;
00079     complex double *yc;
00080     complex double *xc;
00081     double *yr;
00082     double *xr;
00083     sopt_meas_usparam *param;
00084 
00085     //Cast input pointers
00086     param = (sopt_meas_usparam*)data[0];
00087 
00088     if (param->real_flag == 1){
00089       yr = (double*)in;
00090       xr = (double*)out;
00091     }
00092     else {
00093       yc = (complex double*)in;
00094       xc = (complex double*)out;
00095     }
00096 
00097     if (param->real_flag == 1){
00098       for (i=0; i < param->nx; i++)
00099           xr[i] = 0.0;
00100       for (i=0; i < param->nmeas; i++)
00101           xr[param->perm[i]] = yr[i];
00102     }
00103     else {
00104       for (i=0; i < param->nx; i++)
00105           xc[i] = 0.0 +0.0*I;
00106       for (i=0; i < param->nmeas; i++)
00107           xc[param->perm[i]] = yc[i];
00108     }
00109 }

00121 void sopt_meas_identity(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00122     
00123     int *nx;
00124     int *real_flag;
00125     //Cast input pointers
00126     nx = (int*)data[0];
00127     real_flag = (int*)data[1];
00128     //Copy
00129     if (*real_flag == 1) {
00130       cblas_dcopy(*nx, (double*)in, 1, (double*)out, 1);
00131     }
00132     else {
00133       cblas_zcopy(*nx, in, 1, out, 1);
00134     } 
00135 }

00146 void sopt_meas_densematc(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00147 
00148     complex double alpha;
00149     complex double beta;
00150 
00151     alpha = 1.0 + 0.0*I;
00152     beta = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00153     
00154     sopt_meas_dcmatparam *param;
00155 
00156     //Cast input pointers
00157     param = (sopt_meas_dcmatparam*)data[0];
00158     
00159     cblas_zgemv(CblasColMajor, CblasNoTrans, 
00160                  param->nmeas, param->nx,
00161                  (void*)&alpha, (void*)param->mat,
00162                  param->nmeas, in,
00163                  1, (void*)&beta,
00164                  out, 1);    
00165 
00166 }

00343 void sopt_meas_fsamp_c2c(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00344     
00345     int i;
00346     double scale;
00347     int *nx;
00348     int *nmeas;
00349     complex double *yc;
00350     complex double *xc;
00351     int *perm;
00352     complex double *temp;
00353     fftw_plan *plan;
00354 
00355     //Cast input pointers
00356     plan = (fftw_plan*)data[0];
00357     perm = (int*)data[1];
00358     nmeas = (int*)data[2];
00359     nx = (int*)data[3];
00360     temp = (complex double*)data[4];
00361 
00362     yc = (complex double*)out;
00363     xc = (complex double*)in;
00364 
00365     fftw_execute_dft(*plan, xc, temp);
00366 
00367     scale = 1.0/sqrt((double)*nx);
00368 
00369     for (i=0; i < *nmeas; i++)
00370       *(yc + i) = *(temp + *(perm + i))*scale;
00371 }
00372 
00373 #endif

00388 void sopt_meas_fsampadj_c2c(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00389     
00390     int i;
00391     double scale;
00392     int *nx;
00393     int *nmeas;
00394     complex double *yc;
00395     complex double *xc;
00396     int *perm;
00397     complex double *temp;
00398     fftw_plan *plan;
00399 
00400     //Cast input pointers
00401     plan = (fftw_plan*)data[0];
00402     perm = (int*)data[1];
00403     nmeas = (int*)data[2];
00404     nx = (int*)data[3];
00405     temp = (complex double*)data[4];
00406     
00407     yc = (complex double*)out;
00408     xc = (complex double*)in;
00409 
00410     scale = 1.0/sqrt((double)*nx);
00411 
00412     for (i=0; i < *nx; i++)
00413         *(temp + i) = 0.0 +0.0*I;
00414     for (i=0; i < *nmeas; i++)
00415         *(temp + *(perm + i)) = *(xc + i)*scale;
00416     
00417     fftw_execute_dft(*plan, temp, yc);
00418   
00419 }
00420 
00421 #endif

00439 void sopt_meas_fft_r2c_full(void *out, void *in, void **data) {
00440 
00441   fftw_plan *plan;
00442   int *nx, *ny;
00443   double complex *y, *y_half;
00444   int iu, iv, ind, ind_half;
00445   int iu_neg, iv_neg, ind_neg;
00446 
00447   // Cast intput pointers.
00448   y = (double complex*)out;
00449   nx = (int*)data[0];
00450   ny = (int*)data[1];
00451   plan = (fftw_plan*)data[2];
00452 
00453   // Allocate space for output of real-to-complex FFT before compute
00454   // full plane through conjugate symmetry.
00455   y_half = (complex double*)malloc((*nx) * (*ny) * sizeof(complex double));
00456   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y_half);
00457 
00458   // Perform real-to-complex FFT.
00459   fftw_execute_dft_r2c(*plan, 
00460                        (double*)in, 
00461                        y_half);
00462 
00463   // Compute other half of complex plane through conjugate symmetry.
00464   for (iu = 0; iu < (*nx); iu++) {
00465     for (iv = 0; iv < (*ny)/2+1; iv++) {
00466 
00467       ind_half = iu*((*ny)/2+1) + iv;
00468       ind = iu * (*ny) + iv;
00469 
00470       // Copy current data element.
00471       y[ind] = y_half[ind_half];
00472 
00473       // Compute reflected data through conjugate symmetry if
00474       // necessary.
00475       if (iu == 0 && iv == 0) {
00476         // Do nothing for DC component.
00477       } 
00478       else if (iu == 0) {
00479         // Reflect along line iu = 0.
00480         iv_neg = (*ny) - iv;
00481         ind_neg = iu * (*ny) + iv_neg;
00482         if (ind != ind_neg) y[ind_neg] = conj(y_half[ind_half]);
00483       }
00484       else if (iv == 0) {
00485         // Reflect along line iu = 0.
00486         iu_neg = (*nx) - iu;
00487         ind_neg = iu_neg * (*ny) + iv;
00488         if (ind != ind_neg) y[ind_neg] = conj(y_half[ind_half]);
00489       }
00490       else {
00491         // Reflect along diagonal.
00492         iv_neg = (*ny) - iv;
00493         iu_neg = (*nx) - iu;
00494         ind_neg = iu_neg * (*ny) + iv_neg;
00495         if (ind != ind_neg) y[ind_neg] = conj(y_half[ind_half]);
00496       }
00497     }
00498   }
00499   
00500   // Free temporary memory.
00501   free(y_half);
00502 
00503 }
00504 #endif

00520 void sopt_meas_fft_r2c(void *out, void *in, void **data) {
00521 
00522   fftw_plan *plan;
00523   double complex *y;
00524 
00525   // Cast intput pointers.
00526   y = (double complex*)out;
00527   plan = (fftw_plan*)data[0];
00528 
00529   // Perform real-to-complex FFT.
00530   fftw_execute_dft_r2c(*plan, 
00531                        (double*)in, 
00532                        y);
00533 
00534 }
